name: Dinossom Lux

aura.name: thunder_dragon
aura.description: Can be ridden. Enhances Electric attacks while mounted.

description: Though struck by lightning, it lives on. The phrase "struck by a Dinossom Lux's bolt" has come to mean narrowly escaping death.

skills.name: shockwave
skills.description: Quickly discharges electricity, shocking those around it.

skills.name: plasma_tornado
skills.description: Creates two balls of electric energy that fire numerous bolts of lightning at enemies.

skills.name: botanical_smash
skills.description: Dinossom's exclusive skill. Uses large tail to smash the ground in front of it, damaging enemies over a wide area.

skills.name: draconic_breath
skills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

skills.name: tri-lightning
skills.description: Generates lightning that strikes an enemy three times from above.

skills.name: lightning_strike
skills.description: Acts as a lightning rod, calling down thunderbolts that electrocute the surrounding area.

skills.name: lightning_bolt
skills.description: Charges electric energy before blasting enemies with a powerful shock.
